member_organisations:
Relief International has legal standing in the United Kingdom as a registered Charity and in the United States as a not-for-profit 501(c)(3) organisation.  
 
 http://www.ri.org/
fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Budget, International co-operation and development, Enlargement, External Relations, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: Regular briefings to EU officials on our EU-funded programming and wider context where appropriate.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
Relief International partners with some of the world’s most vulnerable communities to relieve poverty, ensure well-being, and advance dignity. Relief International collaborates with and empowers communities responding to crises, creating lasting solutions to their most pressing challenges and promote well-being.  
Relief International focuses on education, water and sanitation, health, and livelihoods, and achieves its aims through implementing the ‘RI Way’ in all programs, which includes local participation, integrated programs, partnerships, and civic skills.
position: SVP of Strategy, Risk and European Operations
